line_items.description: Fees for Tax Audit for the Year ended on 31.12.2024
GST Returned Fees for the Year Ended on 31.12.2024

tax_summary.total_amount_in_words: INR Twenty Nine Thousand Five Hundred Only

processing_summary.summary: This is a Tax Invoice issued by Tallywebsolutions to Mis, Tallywebsolutions. It covers fees for tax audit and GST return services. The total amount payable is INR 29,500.00.
processing_summary.reasoning: Invoice is approved because GST is applied on line items with clear tax rates and a breakdown of CGST/SGST amounts. Additionally, both the seller's and buyer's GSTIN numbers are explicitly provided in the invoice.
